lore: Mounted in a Land Speeder outfitted with additional auspex scanners and vox-casters, it is a Talonmaster’s role to direct the Ravenwing’s fire, using his equipment to ensure no quarry can hide from them. They even identify foes seeking temporary refuge in dense terrain, revealing their location to all Ravenwing warriors.

otherAbilities.name: Talonmaster:
otherAbilities.description: While this model is within 3" of one or more other friendly ADEPTUS ASTARTES MOUNTED or ADEPTUS ASTARTES FLY VEHICLE units, this model has the Lone Operative ability.

otherAbilities.name: Nowhere to Hide:
otherAbilities.description: While a friendly ADEPTUS ASTARTES MOUNTED or ADEPTUS ASTARTES FLY VEHICLE unit is within 6" of this model, ranged weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [IGNORES COVER] ability.

otherAbilities.name: Master of Manoeuvre:
otherAbilities.description: Once per turn, when an enemy unit ends a Normal , Advance or Fall Back move within 9" of this model, if this model is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, this model can make a Normal move of up to 6".
